meanings.definition: Work involving the handling, processing, or completion of documents or forms.
meanings.sent1: I have a lot of paperwork to do at the office.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked us to fill out the paperwork for the field trip.
meanings.sent3: The paperwork piled up on my desk like a mountain of tasks.
meanings.sent4: Her desk was buried under a landslide of paperwork.
meanings.sent5: The paperwork seemed to multiply like rabbits, never-ending and overwhelming.

meanings.definition: Documents or forms that need to be completed or processed.
meanings.sent1: Make sure you submit all the paperwork before the deadline.
meanings.sent2: The paperwork for the loan application is quite extensive.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled coffee on the important paperwork.
meanings.sent4: The paperwork fluttered in the wind like colorful leaves.
meanings.sent5: The paperwork whispered secrets of bureaucracy and rules.
